Upload Video for Notes

Upload your video files and convert them into comprehensive notes using AI transcription and analysis.

Supported video formats:

  • MP4 files - Most common video format
  • MOV files - Apple QuickTime format
  • WEBM files - Web-optimized format
  • AVI files - Audio Video Interleave format
  • MKV files - Matroska video format
⏱️

Processing Time Notice

Video processing typically takes 5-10 minutes depending on video length. Please be patient while we:

  • Extract and transcribe audio using AI speech recognition
  • Generate comprehensive notes from the transcript
  • Create practice quizzes and summaries

💡 Keep this tab open during processing - closing it may interrupt the upload.

Give your notes a descriptive title to help you find them later

Drag and drop your video here

or

MP4, MOV, WEBM, AVI, MKV up to 100MB

EduScribe

Generator notatek z filmów YouTube wspierany sztuczną inteligencją. Stworzony z myślą o uczniach, studentach i nauczycielach.
